name: 2024 IEEE the 13th International Conference on Communications, Circuits, and Systems
content: Publication: After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published in the ICCCAS Conference Proceedings. Conference content will be submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, as well as other Abstracting and Indexing (A&I) databases. Journal Publication: Journal of Communications and Information Networks (ISSN: 2096-1081): Chinese Science Citation Database (CSCD), Ei Compendex, Scopus Journal of Marine Science and Application (ISSN: 1671-9433): Scopus, Google Scholar, SCImago, CSA, CSCD, CJCR Sensors (ISSN: 1424-8220): SCIE (Web of Science), Scopus, Ei Compendex, PubMed, Inspec, etc. Journal of Communications (ISSN: 1796-2021): Scopus, DBLP; CrossRef, EBSCO, Google Scholar; CNKI, etc.
